rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: Entrance with Vastu optimized positioning and Art Deco finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with kitchen. Features geometric Art Deco motifs in design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Large open-plan kitchen connected to the living area, designed with modern Art Deco elements and energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, offering a seamless transition between dining and cooking spaces.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Spacious courtyard with natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom on ground floor for guests, featuring Art Deco inspired interior design.
